title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: 'Ay,' hecontinued, as he puffed audibly, 'it was a very big funeral, wasCairnie's.

title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: Weel, he sat there till aboot hauf six withoot sayin' a singledamn, an' if ye kenned Cairnie an' his weys ye could understaun thatthat gied his women-fouk a glauff.

title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: Therig lies high, an there's aye plenty o' guid fresh air up yonder, andCairnie never in his life had had even a sair heid.

title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: Weel, Cairnie,as we ca'd him for short, had farmed on the Alton rig a' his days.

title: Betty Grier
